data.title: Chroma
data.content:
Chroma
===============

[![Image 1: Chroma](https://www.trychroma.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fchroma.d840f629.png&w=96&q=75&dpl=dpl_Bs3UBTK6xs7NnFxFUZjZicki4YEw)](https://www.trychroma.com/home)

[![Image 2: github_stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/chroma-core/chroma.svg?style=social&label=Star&maxAge=2400)](https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma)

[Docs](https://docs.trychroma.com/)[Github](https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma)[Discord](https://discord.gg/MMeYNTmh3x)[Updates](https://www.trychroma.com/updates)[Careers](https://careers.trychroma.com/)

[Get started](https://docs.trychroma.com/docs/overview/getting-started)Log in[Sign up](https://www.trychroma.com/signup)

Chroma is the open-source AI application database. Batteries included.

Embeddings, vector search, document storage, full-text search, metadata filtering, and multi-modal. All in one place. Retrieval that just works. As it should be.

How it works

Features

Get started

Install

![Image 3: diagram of retrieval-augmented generation](https://www.trychroma.com/_next/static/media/computer.fcd1bd54.svg)

Get Started

[Quick start (Python & JavaScript)](https://docs.trychroma.com/docs/overview/getting-started)[Full-text search and metadata filtering](https://docs.trychroma.com/docs/querying-collections/metadata-filtering)[Retrieve images with multimodal](https://docs.trychroma.com/docs/embeddings/multimodal)[Deploy Chroma to the cloud](https://docs.trychroma.com/production/deployment)[Browse integrations](https://docs.trychroma.com/integrations/chroma-integrations)[Contribute to the project](https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma)

What we're working on:

We're currently focused a full public release of Chroma Cloud powered by our open-source distributed and serverless architecture. Chroma Cloud is currently in production in private preview.

[Learn more](https://www.trychroma.com/engineering/serverless)[Sign Up](https://www.trychroma.com/signup)

What's new

[![Image 4: still frame of interview](https://www.trychroma.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frahul.168b0c12.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_Bs3UBTK6xs7NnFxFUZjZicki4YEw)](https://studios.trychroma.com/rahul-on-julius)

Builders in AI

[Rahul Sonwalkar on building Julius](https://studios.trychroma.com/rahul-on-julius)

Rahul Sonwalkar, founder and CEO of Julius - the AI data scientist, joins Anton to discuss how they use large language models to write code, integrate LLM tool use, detect and mitigate errors, and how to quickly get started and rapidly iterate on an AI product.

[Watch now](https://studios.trychroma.com/rahul-on-julius)

[Interview: Flo Crivello on building Lindy.AI. Watch now →](https://studios.trychroma.com/flo-on-lindy)[Labs: Embedding adatpers - Chroma Research. Read now →](https://research.trychroma.com/embedding-adapters)

[☞All Interviews](https://studios.trychroma.com/)

Tasteful updates, no more than once per week

Community

[![Image 5: discord](https://www.trychroma.com/img/discord.svg) Join the Chroma Discord Server](https://discord.gg/MMeYNTmh3x)[![Image 6: github](https://www.trychroma.com/img/github.svg) Github Community](https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma)[![Image 7: youtube](https://www.trychroma.com/img/youtube.svg) Follow Chroma on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@trychroma)[![Image 8: x](https://www.trychroma.com/img/x.svg) Follow Chroma on Twitter X](https://x.com/trychroma)

FAQs

How can I get support? → Post a [Github issue](https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma/issues), or join [our Discord](https://discord.gg/MMeYNTmh3x).

Does Chroma have a fully-managed cloud version? → [Join the waitlist](https://www.trychroma.com/signup)

What does Chroma cost? → Chroma is free and open-source under the [Apache 2.0 License.](https://github.com/chroma-core/chroma?tab=Apache-2.0-1-ov-file#readme)

Are you hiring? → [Yes](https://careers.trychroma.com/)
